name: Robscarf
description:
Robscarf is a 2D adventure in pixel and retro style.

You will play a little Nebian named Rob  followed by a scarf. A demonic threat will surface on the world of nebusia. Explore many levels and defeat all enemies.

Controls :

  • Arrows for move
  • Espace for jump
  • Z for flying with the Robship

Features :

  • Explore 50 levels spread over 3 different worlds (Earth, Mountain, Volcano).
  • Fight 5 special bosses !
  • A simple gameplay with easy control.

Only you can overcome the enemy invasion. Do it !
